00026 class CPSSoftDeleteBehavior extends CPSBaseActiveRecordBehavior
00027 {
00028     //********************************************************************************
00029     //* Member Variables
00030     //********************************************************************************
00031 
00036     protected $m_sSoftDeleteColumn = null;
00037     
00042     protected $m_arSoftDeleteValue = array( 0, 1 );
00043 
00044     //********************************************************************************
00045     //* Properties
00046     //********************************************************************************
00047     
00052     public function getSoftDeleteColumn() { return $this->m_sSoftDeleteColumn; }
00053     
00058     public function setSoftDeleteColumn( $sValue ) { $this->m_sSoftDeleteColumn = $sValue; }    
00059 
00064     public function getSoftDeleteValue() { return $this->m_arSoftDeleteValue; }
00065     
00070     public function setSoftDeleteValue( $arValue ) { $this->m_arSoftDeleteValue = $arValue; }   
00071     
00072     //********************************************************************************
00073     //*  Event Handlers
00074     //********************************************************************************
00075     
00081     public function beforeDelete( $oEvent )
00082     {
00083         //  Pass it on...
00084         if ( parent::beforeDelete( $oEvent ) )
00085         {
00086             //  We want to be the top of the chain...
00087             if ( $this->m_sSoftDeleteColumn && $oEvent->isValid && ! $oEvent->handled )
00088             {
00089                 //  Perform a soft delete if this model allows
00090                 if ( $oEvent->sender->hasAttribute( $this->m_sSoftDeleteColumn ) )
00091                 {
00092                     $oEvent->isValid = false;
00093                     $oEvent->handled = true;
00094                     $oEvent->sender->setAttribute( $this->m_sSoftDeleteColumn, $this->m_arSoftDeleteValue[ 1 ] );
00095                     if ( ! $oEvent->sender->update( array( $this->m_sSoftDeleteColumn ) ) )
00096                         throw new CDbException( 'Error saving soft delete row.' );
00097                 }
00098             }
00099             
00100             return true;
00101         }
00102         
00103         return false;
00104     }
00105     
00110     public function beforeFind( $oEvent )
00111     {
00112         if ( $this->m_sSoftDeleteColumn && $this->owner->hasAttribute( $this->m_sSoftDeleteColumn ) ) 
00113         {
00114             //  Merge in the soft delete indicator
00115             $oEvent->sender->getDbCriteria()->mergeWith(
00116                 array( 
00117                     'condition' => $this->m_sSoftDeleteColumn . ' = :softDeleteValue', 
00118                     'params' => array( ':softDeleteValue' => $this->m_arSoftDeleteValue[ 0 ] ),
00119                 )
00120             );
00121         }
00122 
00123         //  Pass it on...
00124         return parent::beforeFind( $oEvent );
00125     }
00126     
00127     //********************************************************************************
00128     //* Public Methods
00129     //********************************************************************************
00130     
00136     public function undelete()
00137     {
00138         if ( $this->m_sSoftDeleteColumn )
00139         {
00140             //  Perform a soft delete if this model allows
00141             if ( $this->hasAttribute( $this->m_sSoftDeleteColumn ) )
00142             {
00143                 $this->setAttribute( $this->m_sSoftDeleteColumn, $this->m_arSoftDeleteValue[ 0 ] );
00144                 return $this->update( array( $this->m_sSoftDeleteColumn ) );
00145             }
00146         }
00147         
00148         //  Otherwise, not possible
00149         return false;
00150     }
00151     
00152 }
